'''Christopher Nightingale''' is a Tony Award winner for the "Best Original Score written for Theatre" for ''[[wikipedia:A Christmas Carol (2017 play)|A Christmas Carol]]'', a Tony nominee for ''[[wikipedia:Matilda the Musical|Matilda, The Musical]]'', a Grammy nominee for the Matilda US Album and NY Outer Critic Circle Honouree for ''A Christmas Carol''. He composed the music for ''[[The Lord of the Rings (musical)]]'', along with [[V채rttin채]] and [[A.R. Rahman]].
